description.p: Gets list of keys from IndexedDB.
A JavaScript function to call when the operation succeeds. The onSuccess function is passed a parameter, *[js:data]*, which is the list of keys from IndexedDb.
A JavaScript function to call when the operation fails.

discussion.p: The *[js:idbGetKeys()]* method retrieves a list of keys (item names) from IndexedDB.

see.ref: MDN IndexedDB key characteristics and basic terminology
